sqlList.sql: select cityid, areaid, name_zh, name_en, name_zh||'('||pinyin_short||') '||pinyin AS cityNM from fog_t_city order by pinyin

SELECT lm.ID, lm.city_id AS cityID,lm.city_id AS citycode,lm.name_cn||'('||lm.pinyin_short||')' as cityNM , lm.pinyin, lm.status AS ONLINESTATUS, (CASE lm.status WHEN '0' THEN '下线' WHEN '1' THEN '上线' ELSE '' END ) as ONLINEDIS, lm.SEQ, lm.CREATE_TIME AS CDTIME, lm.UPDATE_TIME AS UDTIME,lm.TYPE AS CITYTYPES,SALE_HOUR,'['||lm.city_id||']'||lm.name_cn AS CONSULTVAL from t_lm_b_city lm where ((:CITYNAME IS NULL) OR (NLS_LOWER(lm.name_cn) LIKE '%'||NLS_LOWER(:CITYNAME)||'%') OR (NLS_LOWER(lm.pinyin_short) LIKE '%'||NLS_LOWER(:CITYNAME)||'%') OR (NLS_LOWER(lm.pinyin) LIKE '%'||NLS_LOWER(:CITYNAME)||'%')) AND ((:ONLINESTATUS IS NULL) OR (lm.status=:ONLINESTATUS)) AND ((:StartDTime IS NULL) OR (to_date(:StartDTime, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= lm.CREATE_TIME)) AND ((:EndDTime IS NULL) OR (lm.CREATE_TIME <= to_date(:EndDTime, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'))) AND rownum < 6 ORDER BY lm.SEQ ASC

SELECT lm.ID, lm.ID AS cityID,lm.city_id AS citycode,fc.name_zh||'('||fc.pinyin_short||')' as cityNM , fc.pinyin, lm.status AS ONLINESTATUS, (CASE lm.status WHEN '0' THEN '下线' WHEN '1' THEN '上线' ELSE '' END ) as ONLINEDIS, lm.CREATE_TIME AS CDTIME, lm.UPDATE_TIME AS UDTIME from t_lm_b_city lm inner join fog_t_city fc on fc.cityid=lm.city_id where ((:CITYNAME IS NULL) OR (fc.name_zh LIKE '%'||:CITYNAME||'%') OR (fc.pinyin_short LIKE '%'||:CITYNAME||'%') OR (fc.pinyin LIKE '%'||:CITYNAME||'%')) AND ((:ONLINESTATUS IS NULL) OR (lm.status=:ONLINESTATUS)) AND ((:StartDTime IS NULL) OR (to_date(:StartDTime, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= lm.CREATE_TIME)) AND ((:EndDTime IS NULL) OR (lm.CREATE_TIME <= to_date(:EndDTime, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'))) ORDER BY lm.ID DESC
select lm.city_id from t_lm_b_city lm where (lm.city_id = :CITYID)
select cityid, areaid, name_zh, name_en, name_zh||'('||pinyin_short||') '||pinyin AS cityNM from fog_t_city where cityid=:CITYID

insert into t_lm_b_city (id, CITY_ID, area_id, name_cn, name_en, name_jp, seq, dareaid, gbcode, pinyin, pinyin_short, sname, lname, zipcode, phonecode, hotelnum, longitude, latitude，status, CREATE_TIME,UPDATE_TIME,TYPE,NAME,EL_CITY_ID,IS_HOT) select :ID, cityid, areaid, name_zh, name_en, name_jp, seq, dareaid, gbcode, pinyin, pinyin_short, sname, lname, zipcode, phonecode, hotelnum, longitude, latitude, '0', sysdate,sysdate,'10000000000000000000',name_zh,null,'00000000000000000000' from fog_t_city where cityid=:CITYID
INSERT INTO t_lm_b_city(ID, city_id, Name_CN, Name_EN, Area_ID, status, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) VALUES (:ID, :CITYID, :Name_CN, :Name_EN, :Area_ID, '0', SYSDATE, SYSDATE)

UPDATE T_LM_B_CITY SET EL_CITY_ID = :ELCITYID, NAME_CN = :NAMECN, SEQ = :SEQ, PINYIN = :PINYIN, PINYIN_SHORT = :PINYINSHORT, LONGITUDE = :LONGITUDE, LATITUDE = :LATITUDE, STATUS = :ONLINESTATUS, UPDATE_TIME = SYSDATE, TYPE=:TYPE, IS_HOT = :ISHOT, SALE_HOUR = :SALEHOUR WHERE CITY_ID = :CITYID
UPDATE t_lm_b_city SET status=:ONLINESTATUS, UPDATE_TIME=SYSDATE WHERE ID=:ID

select id, city_id, el_city_id,area_id, name_cn, name_en, name_jp, seq, dareaid, gbcode, pinyin, pinyin_short, sname, lname, zipcode, phonecode, hotelnum, longitude, latitude, status, create_time, update_time,type as citytypes,is_hot,sale_hour from t_lm_b_city where city_id=:CITYID

select cityid AS city_id, areaid, name_zh AS name_cn, name_en, name_jp, seq, dareaid, gbcode, pinyin, pinyin_short, sname, lname, zipcode, phonecode, hotelnum, longitude, latitude from fog_t_city where cityid=:CITYID

select cityid, areaid, name_zh, name_en,pinyin_short, name_zh||'('||pinyin_short||') '||pinyin AS cityNM from fog_t_city where 1=1 and(name_zh like '%'||:name_zh||'%' or name_en like '%'||:name_en||'%' or pinyin_short like '%'||:pinyin_short||'%') order by pinyin
select FAX_URL from T_FAX_UNKNOWN where create_time >= TO_DATE('2013-11-03 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and create_time <= TO_DATE('2013-11-04 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
